name: Crumble:Curse of the Time Orb
description:
The version of the game uploaded is missing some files for the characters which breaks the inventory system. Fortunately the inventory isn't actually necessary to play. Unfortunately it does make the game more difficult.
Unzip the release.zip file
run crumber_cotto.exe

When the game starts, immediately press I to hide the broken inventory UI.
Without the inventory, you can carry one item at a time in your hand.

Retrieve the Time Orb from the dungeon to win your freedom.
